name: Scholar's Cap [fading]
data: It decreases the users strength poorly.
It decreases the users dexterity a bit.
It decreases the users constitution a tiny bit.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration an average amount.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'offensive control'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'upper hand'.
Cap of the Scholar seems to modify the wearer's skills.
